newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Scania wins 250 mln skr bus order.
newsitem.headline: Scania wins 250 mln skr bus order.

text.p: Swedish bus and truck maker Scania said on Friday it had won orders for 290 buses and bus chassis from England's FirstBus and Egypt's Ghabbour Bros. Co worth around 250 million crowns.
Scania said the order from England meant it now had about 12 percent market share of the British bus market. FirstBus had ordered 145 buses from its English unit Reliable Vehicles Ltd.
